txt.en:
'I thank you again for coming, [placeholder]. When I found the Slade of Shadows, I did not expect it to be so utterly inhabited by evils from the ancient world. I avoided detection for a short time, but I did not wish to risk betraying our presence here to the Enemy.

'It may be, though, that one such as yourself, with no true tie to the DÃºnedain, might be able to confront the foe without breaking the secrecy of the Grey Company.

'Will you lend me your aid?'
Talk to Andreg near the Slade of Shadows
'With what you discovered in the Slade of Shadows, I think I know how to ensnare Gwyllion. We shall be revealed, but I think the risk is worth the gain.'
In the Shadow of the Mountain
The Rangers Saeradan, Amlan, and Andreg have tracked Gwyllion, the Old Woman of the Mountain, from the Windfells in Enedwaith to the Gravenwood of Dunland.
Andreg is near the Slade of Shadows, south of the Rohirrim scout-camp.\n\nAndreg has asked you to help him face the evils at the Slade of Shadows.
Andreg is near the Slade of Shadows, south of the Rohirrim scout-camp.\n\nYou should return to Andreg with news of your successes.
